::Slayer::

Slayer whirls out of the way of the incoming shots. The war suit 
designed for him from K-9's body parts by Blaze was holding up nicely, 
but he was still shedding some mechfluid where the suit had been 
punctured. He activates the infared goggles, looking around and seeing 
where the enemies were firing at him from better than before. What he 
needed was a drill to get to Prebon, or....

Slayer lowers in altitude, able to see his enemies and avoid most of 
the attacks. The shots that did hit him didn't do too much damage, but 
he tried to avoid them all anyways. Thanks to his scanners and infared 
vision, he could see the entrance to the tunnel that Prebon was in.

Slayer aims a missile from each of his two shoulder-mounted missile 
launcher at the two bots firing at him, letting loose two 
signature-seeking missiles at each. He gets a lock on the entrance to 
the tunnel, preparing two more missiles.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius stood outside the trainers base waiting for a sign from 
Slayer.
> 
> . "Hey, I wouldn't mind some backup over here,"  comes over the comm 
from
> Slayer. The sign was clear that the Trainers were seriously 
outnumbered.
> 
> "I'm on my way." Ignatius calls out into his own comm as he takes 
off
> skyward toward Slayers location.
> 
> meanwhile in the fortress Slayers message reached his leader.
> 
> "Commander, I can't hold out much longer. I'm fighting an army 
here." Slayer
> sounded desperate but his loyalty came through without question.
> 
> To weak to reply Prebon pressed a button on his comm activating a 
homing
> beacon directed to transmetal technology. The resonance was designed 
for
> just this type of emergency. "Keep up the good fight Slayer." he 
thought as
> the Trainer leader struggled for consciousness "You will be rewarded 
well."
> 
> 
> 
>
